examples.example: 今天真是遇到了好多好事，让我心情格外舒畅。

translate.english: Today I really encountered a lot of good things, which made me feel extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 每天做一件好事，会让我们的生活更加美好。

translate.english: Doing a good deed every day will make our life more beautiful.

examples.example: 生活中总会有好事发生，我们要心怀期待。

translate.english: There will always be good things happening in life, and we should have expectations in our hearts.
